options.name: Upload A File In Blocks Pre Uploading
options.value: Upload A File In Blocks Pre Uploading
options.action: Upload A File In Blocks Pre Uploading Docs File Management File Multipart Upload Files
options.description: Sends an initialization request to obtain an upload transaction ID and a split policy. The current policy is to split a file into 4 MB fixed-length blocks. API reference documentation: [Upload a file in blocks (PreÂ­uploading)]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/drive-v1/file/upload_prepare)

options.name: Upload A File In Blocks Upload Blocks
options.value: Upload A File In Blocks Upload Blocks
options.action: Upload A File In Blocks Upload Blocks Docs File Management File Multipart Upload Files
options.description: Uploads blocks of a specified file. API reference documentation: [Upload a file in blocks (Upload blocks)]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/drive-v1/file/upload_part)

options.name: Complete Uploading A File In Blocks
options.value: Complete Uploading A File In Blocks
options.action: Complete Uploading A File In Blocks Docs File Management File Multipart Upload Files
options.description: Completes an upload task. API reference documentation: [Complete uploading a file in blocks]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/drive-v1/file/upload_finish)

options.name: Upload A File
options.action: Upload A File Docs File Management File
options.description: Uploads a file to a specified directory in My Space. API reference documentation: [Upload a file]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/drive-v1/file/upload_all)

options.name: Download A File
options.action: Download A File Docs File Management File
options.description: This API is used to download files from a directory in My Space, excluding online documents in Lark Docs, Sheets, and MindNotes. You can download a file based on a specified range. API reference documentation: [Download a file]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/drive-v1/file/download)

options.name: Delete A File
options.action: Delete A File Docs File Management File
options.description: Deletes a file from My Space. API reference documentation: [Delete a file]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/drive-v1/file/delete)

options.name: Add Permissions
options.action: Add Permissions Docs File Management Permission Permission Member
options.description: This API is used to add permissions on a document for a user based on a filetoken. API reference documentation: [Add permissions]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/drive-v1/permission-member/create)

options.name: Updates Permissions Of A Collaborator
options.action: Updates Permissions Of A Collaborator Docs File Management Permission Permission Member
options.description: This API is used to update permissions of a document collaborator based on a filetoken. API reference documentation: [Updates permissions of a collaborator]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/drive-v1/permission-member/update)

options.name: Delete Permissions Of A Collaborator
options.action: Delete Permissions Of A Collaborator Docs File Management Permission Permission Member
options.description: This API is used to delete permissions of a document collaborator based on a filetoken. API reference documentation: [Delete permissions of a collaborator]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/drive-v1/permission-member/delete)

options.name: Update Common Settings Of A Document
options.value: Update Common Settings Of A Document
options.action: Update Common Settings Of A Document Docs File Management Permission Permission Public
options.description: This API is used to update the common settings of a document based on a filetoken. API reference documentation: [Update common settings of a document]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/drive-v1/permission-public/patch)

options.name: Obtain Statistics Of A File
options.action: Obtain Statistics Of A File Docs File Management Statistics
options.description: This API is used to obtain statistics of a file, including the number of unique visitors (UVs), the number of page views (PVs), and the number of likes. API reference documentation: [Obtain statistics of a file]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/drive-v1/file-statistics/get)

options.name: Upload A Material In Blocks Pre Uploading
options.value: Upload A Material In Blocks Pre Uploading
options.action: Upload A Material In Blocks Pre Uploading Docs File Management Media Multipart Upload Media
options.description: Sends an initialization request to obtain an upload transaction ID and a split policy. The current policy is to split a file into 4 MB fixed-length blocks. API reference documentation: [Upload a material in blocks (PreÂ­uploading)]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/drive-v1/media/upload_prepare)

options.name: Upload A Material In Blocks Upload Blocks
options.value: Upload A Material In Blocks Upload Blocks
options.action: Upload A Material In Blocks Upload Blocks Docs File Management Media Multipart Upload Media
options.description: Uploads blocks of a specified file. API reference documentation: [Upload a material in blocks (Upload blocks)]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/drive-v1/media/upload_part)

options.name: Complete Uploading A Material In Blocks
options.value: Complete Uploading A Material In Blocks
options.action: Complete Uploading A Material In Blocks Docs File Management Media Multipart Upload Media
options.description: Completes an upload task. API reference documentation: [Complete uploading a material in blocks]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/drive-v1/media/upload_finish)

options.name: Upload A Material
options.action: Upload A Material Docs File Management Media
options.description: Uploads a material (images or files) required by Docs or other Lark suite to My Space. API reference documentation: [Upload a material]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/drive-v1/media/upload_all)

options.name: Obtain A Temporary Material Download Url
options.value: Obtain A Temporary Material Download Url
options.action: Obtain A Temporary Material Download Url Docs File Management Media
options.description: Obtain the temporary download URL of a material based on a file_token. The URL is valid for 24 hours. API reference documentation: [Obtain a temporary material download URL]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/drive-v1/media/batch_get_tmp_download_url)

options.name: Download A Material
options.action: Download A Material Docs File Management Media
options.description: This API is used to download materials. Materials refer to files in various production containers, for example, images in a document and files. You can download a material based on a specified range. API reference documentation: [Download a material]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/drive-v1/media/download)

options.name: Obtain A Comment List
options.action: Obtain A Comment List Docs File Management Comment
options.description: Obtains all Doc comments in Docs by pages. API reference documentation: [Obtain a comment list]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/drive-v1/file-comment/list)

options.name: Add A Comment
options.action: Add A Comment Docs File Management Comment
options.description: Adds a global comment to Docs. API reference documentation: [Add a comment]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/drive-v1/file-comment/create)

options.name: Obtain A Comment
options.action: Obtain A Comment Docs File Management Comment
options.description: Obtains a specified comment in Docs. API reference documentation: [Obtain a comment]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/drive-v1/file-comment/get)

options.name: Solve Or Restore A Comment
options.action: Solve Or Restore A Comment Docs File Management Comment
options.description: Solves or restores a comment on a document in Docs. API reference documentation: [Solve or restore a comment]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/drive-v1/file-comment/patch)

options.name: Update A Reply
options.action: Update A Reply Docs File Management Comment
options.description: Updates a reply to a document in Docs. API reference documentation: [Update a reply]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/drive-v1/file-comment-reply/update)

options.name: Delete A Reply
options.action: Delete A Reply Docs File Management Comment
options.description: Deletes a reply to a document in Docs. API reference documentation: [Delete a reply]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/drive-v1/file-comment-reply/delete)

options.name: Create Subscription
options.action: Create Subscription Docs File Management Subscription
options.description: Subscribe to change events in the document, currently supporting document comment subscriptions API reference documentation: [Create Subscription]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/drive-v1/file-subscription/create)

options.name: Get Subscription Status
options.action: Get Subscription Status Docs File Management Subscription
options.description: Get the status of the subscription based on the subscription ID API reference documentation: [Get subscription status]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/drive-v1/file-subscription/get)

options.name: Update Subscription Status
options.action: Update Subscription Status Docs File Management Subscription
options.description: Update subscription status based on subscription ID API reference documentation: [Update subscription status]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/drive-v1/file-subscription/patch)

options.name: Create An Import Task
options.action: Create An Import Task Docs File Management Document Import
options.description: Creates an import task. You can import files of the doc, sheet, and bitable types. For more information, see [User guide on importing files]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/drive-v1/import_task/import-user-guide). API reference documentation: [Create an import task]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/drive-v1/import_task/create)

options.name: Query The Import Task Result
options.action: Query The Import Task Result Docs File Management Document Import
options.description: Queries the result of an import task based on the ticket returned when the task was created. API reference documentation: [Query the import task result]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/drive-v1/import_task/get)
